item.description:
Come join us for an afternoon of crafting, good food and fun at Pete's Corner Stone Creations in Sturbridge.

We will be gathering at 12:30 for a pizza party from Encrico's- $10.00 will cover the pizza, drinks and dessert- and will include materials for the money spell craft.

After dessert, Pete will be leading a Casting Class where you can make your own pagan wall plaque for
$15.00. You can choose from a wide variety of plaques on the wall, to make your own- choices range from
green men, goddess'es, pentacles, earth spirit faces, animal and symbol plaques and much more!

While your resin plaque is drying, we will be doing a money spell craft, and a money spell swap
( participation optional)(bring 13 copies of your favorite money spell to share with the group!)
and some good ol' pagan conversation!

Sign up soon, as spaces are limited, and please do not sign up unless you sure you can attend.....

Snow date will be the following Saturday, January 23rd-
Be sure to watch email list for cancellation!!
item.name: Pagan Casting Class & Pizza Party
